member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Interception.DynamicProxyModule
member.summary: Extends the functionality of the kernel, providing a proxy factory that uses Castle DynamicProxy2 to generate dynamic proxies.

member.summary: Loads the module into the kernel.
